definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: The Plant A is the most widely distributed genus of the Rutaceae.
sentences.chinese: 植物A是芸香科中最广泛分布的一属。

sentences.english: The results showed that pilocarpine was also an inhibitor of platelet aggregation.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现毛果芸香碱也是血小板聚集的抑制剂。

sentences.english: Rue and thyme grow both in one garden.
sentences.chinese: 芸香和百里香，一个花园里长。

sentences.english: The ratio of chlorogenic acid to rutin in tobacco of South Africa is the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 南非烤烟绿原酸和芸香苷含量的比值最低。

sentences.english: For me the cypress and the rue.
Chang yu want rue to blackmail with him to find out whether the primary messenger.
sentences.chinese: 昌渝希望芸香能跟他一起找出勒索霆中的主使者。

sentences.english: Beovergrown with bitter weeds and rue.
sentences.chinese: 长满了苦涩的野草和芸香。
